name: Veloren
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: Veloren is a multiplayer voxel RPG written in Rust. It is inspired by games such as Cube World, Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Dwarf Fortress and Minecraft.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y curl wget unzip git jq

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/veloren/veloren/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/veloren/veloren/releases")
ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "linux-x86_64" || echo "linux-aarch64")
PART=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "-linux-x86_64-" || echo "-linux-aarch64-")
MATCH_AND_SPACES=$(echo "weekly" && echo ${PART} && echo ${RELEASE_DATE})
MATCH=$(echo ${MATCH_AND_SPACES} | sed 's/ //g')


if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "weekly" ]; then
    echo -e "weekly"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i "${ARCH}" | tail -n 1)
elif [ "${VERSION}" == "nightly" ]; then
    echo -e "nightly"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "nightly" '.[] | select(.tag_name=="nightly") | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i "${ARCH}" | tail -n 1)
elif [ "${VERSION}" == "dated_weekly" ]; then
    echo -e ${MATCH} 
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i "${MATCH}")
else
    echo -e  "something went wrong"
fi

echo -e "download url: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
wget ${DOWNLOAD_URL} -O files.zip

unzip -o files.zip
rm files.zip

chmod +x veloren-server-cli

## generate config because there is no better way to get it.
mkdir -p /mnt/server/userdata/server/server_config/
if [ ! -f /mnt/server/userdata/server/server_config/settings.ron ]; then
    wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/veloren/settings.ron /tmp/settings.ron
    sed "s/14004/${SERVER_PORT}/g" /tmp/settings.ron > /mnt/server/userdata/server/server_config/settings.ron
    rm /tmp/settings.ron
    echo "config file pulled"
fi

echo -e "install complete"

variables.name: Version
variables.description:
weekly = download the latest weekly build,
nightly = download the latestes nightly build,
dated_weekly = download specific weekly build for that set the Weekly specific build date.

variables.name: Weekly specific build date
variables.description:
The date of the weekly version you want. 
Only used if Version is set to dated_weekly!
https://github.com/veloren/veloren/releases

Everything after the x86_64 but not the first -
and not the .zip extention

example:
2022-08-31T08_26 or 2022-09-26T13_34

variables.description: The name your server will be displaying
